      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113961</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Attraction and repulsion of charges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung und Abstossung der Ladungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction et répulsion des frais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração e repulsion das cargas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione e repulsione delle spese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλξη και απέχθεια των δαπανών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción y repulsión de cargas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that a positive charge and negative charge attract each other while same charges repel each other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrostatic induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß eine positive Ladung 
und negative Ladung sich anziehen, während die gleichen Ladungen sich
abstoßen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre qu'une charge 
positive et la charge négative s'attirent tandis que les mêmes frais
se repoussent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que uma carga positiva
e a carga negativa se atraem quando as mesmas cargas se repelirem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che una carica 
positiva e la carica negativa si attraggono mentre le stesse spese si 
respingono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι μια θετική δαπάνη
και η αρνητική δαπάνη προσελκύουν η μια την άλλη ενώ οι ίδιες 
δαπάνες αποκρούουν η μια την άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que una carga 
positiva y la carga negativa se atraen mientras que las mismas cargas 
se rechazan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrostatische Induktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">negative Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
